main.name: Dayita Chaudhuri
main.description: I am a Second-Year CSE Undergrad and a full stack web developer. I use React, Angular and Django frameworks to develop pages. This is my resume. Feel free to check it out and leave me your opinion through the contact section.

main.contactmessage: Are you interested in working with me, or do you just wanna meet up for some chitchat? I love meeting and working with new people. Hit me up through the form below.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Application Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked on a platform to enable proactive, automated monitoring of critical supply chaindata. Developed an end-to-end module to manage goals and configurations that are leveraged by the monitoring and alerting system workflow. Worked with Angular, Java, Boq and Apps Framework among other internal tools. Also performed extensive testing of both frontend and backend components using JUnit and Jasmine.

work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description: Used web technologies and coordinated with an experienced team to build web solutions for teh comany as well as other partner institutions. Got to interact with and learn from professionals working in the field of Software Development for 10+ years.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
